page.title: 16FARMS-BRAISHFIELD AREA
page.content: Of the farms shown on the O.S.map covering this block,only 5 are working farms. PAYNES HAY,UPPER SLACKSTEAD,& WOOLLEY GREEN FARMS,are arable with wheat,oats barley and oil seed rape grown. PUCKNALL & HAWKES FARM jointly produce wheat and have a breeding flock of 400 sheep. FAIRBOURNES is a dairy farm. The land from SHARPES & MERRIE MEAD farms is worked by PAYNES HAY & PITT farms and is arable. ABBOTSWOOD FARM is a small-holding, & CROOKHILL FARM was last farmed 23 years ago.. LOWER FARM has 18 acres of rough grazing with 2 house cows. There are 2 egg producing farms, one at LOWER SLACKSTEAD,& one at AMPFIELD.
